Description:
Detects the use of a Microsoft signed script executing a managed DLL with PowerShell.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: UtilityFunctions.ps1 Proxy Dll
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%utilityfunctions.ps1%' or command like '%regsnapin %')
